title: Design and Utilization of Augmented Reality-Based Narrative Educational Games

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment integrating augmented reality technology into social domain education courses for enhancing workplace competencies among employees.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental design principles of augmented reality-based educational games
Learners can draft game scenarios based on narrative structures
Learners can develop prototypes of augmented reality educational games using mobile devices (BYOD)
Learners can plan educational game content combining historical/social themes with augmented reality technology
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of augmented reality educational games through team-based projects

resources: Educational AR Game Case Study Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
